::: {.column width="60%"}
Kranti is a clinical researcher interested in cross-cultural issues in the assessment and treatment of cognitive-communication disorders, such as the reliability and validity of tests developed in English languages on the Nepali population.
She is an Assistant Professor at the National Academy of Medical Sciences (NAMS), Bir Hospital, Kathmandu.
:::
